question: they said there mom she have some kinda of Saya on her.. i would like to know wat can you do to Help her.. i mean wat kinda surats she can read to help herself.
answer:
QUESTION

I have A very important Question. I got some very close friends, and They are going thru some tension from a while.. and i wanted to check if they had some black magic or if they had to give some sadqa or somthing.. and so Some of the maulvi in Pakistan that i know they checked it and they said there mom she have some kinda of Saya on her.. i would like to know wat can you do to Help her.. i mean wat kinda surats she can read to help herself. i will be lookin forward to ur reply

ANSWER


Share:

This world is full of tests. Allah Ta’ala tests a person in many ways. In that condition, a person will experience tension and pain. It is not appropriate to blindly attribute all pain to black magic. During difficulties and pain, one should resort to Salaat and Du’aa. Favourable conditions as well as adverse conditions are from Allah. He is the only one to remove pain and hardship. Turn to Him, He will guide to means of ease and comfort.

Abstain from sin. Fulfil the daily obligations of Shari’ah. Also try to remain in the state of Wudhu. After all the above, recite Aayaatul Kursi after each Fardh Salaat and the four Quls at night before sleeping.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
